source: TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_SEQ_00<tab>Faucertaux seeks your aid in reclaiming a village from a band of outlaws.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_SEQ_00<tab>クォーリーミルのフォセルトーには、討伐してほしい者がいるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_SEQ_01<tab>A notorious band of outlaws known as the Redbelly Wasps has taken over an abandoned village and turned it into a hive of villainy. Slay a Redbelly lookout, sharpeye, and larcener.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_SEQ_01<tab>フォセルトーは「似我蜂団」から村を奪回したいようだ。レッドベリー砦近くの「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) 3501 /var>」「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) 5401 /var>」「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) AD01 /var>」を1体ずつ討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_SEQ_02<tab>You have dispatched three of the Redbelly Wasps. Report your success to Faucertaux.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_SEQ_02<tab>似我蜂団を討伐した。クォーリーミルの「フォセルトー」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_SEQ_03<tab>Your success in routing the bandits has given Faucertaux hope that the day when Hyur and Elezen once again reside peacefully in the village is close at hand.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_SEQ_03<tab>斥候が排除されたことで、フォセルトーは村の奪回に光明を見出したようだ。フォセルトーの戦いがうまくいくことを祈ろう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_FAUCERTAUX_000_000<tab>Mayhap you've heard the tales, but the place they call Redbelly Hive wasn't always a wretched nest of scum and villainy.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_FAUCERTAUX_000_000<tab>この近くにある「レッドベリー砦」は、
もとはバウバリー村と言ってな。
フォレスター族とミッドランダー族が暮らす小村だったんだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_FAUCERTAUX_000_001<tab>In the old days, it was home to a hamlet called Boughbury, where Hyur and Elezen alike lived a life of peace. That was before the Calamity came and all hells broke loose. Those Redbelly whoresons moved in when the villagers fled, and they've had their run of the place ever since.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_FAUCERTAUX_000_001<tab>だが、霊災時に村民が避難していた隙に、
ならず者集団「似我蜂団」に占領されてしまった。
我々鬼哭隊も奪還しようとしているが旗色が悪い。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_FAUCERTAUX_000_002<tab>It is our hope to win the village back, but the Redbellies are no common outlaws─they read our every move from malms away. That's where you come in: what say you enter the Wasps' nest and take the sting out of those bastards?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_FAUCERTAUX_000_002<tab>奴らの斥候が優秀らしく、こちらの動きを読まれていてな。
そこで自由に動ける冒険者、お前の出番だ。
「似我蜂団」の斥候たちを討伐してくれないだろうか。
TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>レッドベリー砦近くの「似我蜂団」を三種各一体ずつ討伐

source: TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_FAUCERTAUX_000_010<tab>You've fought well for us today, friend. When Boughbury is reclaimed for our people, you can take pride in knowing that you struck a vital blow.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA608_00770_FAUCERTAUX_000_010<tab>うむ、よくやってくれた！
敵の砦は奴らの仲間で溢れているが、
お前の一撃が、きっと我々の突破口になるだろう！
